Author: tishamdhar
Content: @bunnie I am wiring up the CH347 to the NeTV2, will make a wiring diagram as part of making it work with Raspberry Pi 5, does the netv2 have an on board JTAG chip / programming port ? On the JTAG port attached to the Raspberry Pi is the RST pin equivalent of SRST on JTAG ?

Author: bunnievorpal
Content: the ⁨`RES`⁩ pin next to GND goes to PROGRAM_B on the FPGA

Author: bunnievorpal
Content: in other words, holding that low will fully reset the FPGA and cause it to reload its bitstream
